update.releaseNotes:
v2.2.0 - Changelog
- Enabled proper support for tablets of minimum width 1600 pixels (like the Galaxy Tab S7 with its 2650x1600 resolution). - Minor change to Notification title. - Added support for the new Characters: Special Week (Summer) and Maruzensky (Summer). - Added support for the new Support Card: SSR Speed Sweep Tosho and SSR Stamina Winning Ticket.
